imdb.plot outline: Reggie vlogs his marriage experiences to his best friend Brent Stone as a way to encourage to get married but to be prepared for all that marriage comes with, specifically juggling family time against time with friends. In doing this Reggie realizes that he has insecurities with his wife's profession as a print model. All while he tries to be the best husband, father and friend he can be. In hilarious episodes we watch Reggie deal with these real life situations with his family & friends.
imdb.title: Reggie's Family & Friends
plot: Reggie Alexander has to navigate through all the problems with his family friends while at the same time trying to keep himself out of trouble with his wife due to his own insecurities.::Reggie Gaskins

Reggie vlogs his marriage experiences to his best friend Brent Stone as a way to encourage to get married but to be prepared for all that marriage comes with, specifically juggling family time against time with friends. In doing this Reggie realizes that he has insecurities with his wife's profession as a print model. All while he tries to be the best husband, father and friend he can be. In hilarious episodes we watch Reggie deal with these real life situations with his family & friends.::Reggie Gaskins
